channel.title: Time Machine by H.G. Wells
channel.description: Hey guys, I absolutely despise reading and even though I'm a straight A student, I cannot bring myself to read a simple book even if it means getting a bad grade. Well, I am on the border of B+ and A- and I really need an A. Has anyone ever read the Time Machine by H.G. Wells? If so, could you PLEASE provide a short 1-2 paragraph summary of the book. I can do my entire project off of a brief, yet thorough summary, please help me out!!

item.title: Time Machine by H.G. Wells
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Great book man, just take a little time to read it, you won’t regret it one bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Time Machine by H.G. Wells
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:3, topic:541098”][quote author=Krackkid link=topic=659967.msg4412880#msg4412880 date=1394501452]
Stop being a lazyass either do your work, fail, or drop out.
[/quote]

Why post if you refuse to be helpful? Nobody in the entire world can honestly say that there is nothing that they just kept putting off until the last minute and then end up being screwed and try to find help. Not even you. Please don’t post unless you’re helping.[/quote]Even if no one can say that, it is still their fault it even got to the point LoL

Read full topic

item.title: Time Machine by H.G. Wells
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

If you don’t read you will not stay a straight A student for very long (doubt you are at all). Any type of reading is fine (a book, wikipedia, an article, anything!), personally I read ~2 hours a day about history, philosophy or maths.

Stop being a lazyass either do your work, fail, or drop out.

Why post if you refuse to be helpful? Nobody in the entire world can honestly say that there is nothing that they just kept putting off until the last minute and then end up being screwed and try to find help. Not even you. Please don’t post unless you’re helping.[/quote]You’re correct, you are screwed so deal with it. This isn’t asking for “help” this is just asking for someone to cover your ass since you didn’t want to read. Real help would be asking advice on solving something, not asking “do this for me” type of deal.
